remarks: The projective map of the join of a lattice element and a lattice line (expressed as the join ` Q .\/ R ` of two atoms).  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2012.)
statement:
pmapjat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapjat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pmapjat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmapjat.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapjat.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmapjlln1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. B /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( M ` ( X .\/ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) = ( ( M ` X ) .+ ( M ` ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) ) $.
